title: Detention
occurrences: ...And the students in detention are all that's left.

And when I heard that my snuggle bunny got detention...
Maybe it was the ghost of detention's past showing us the way out of here.
...Is covering you guys in detention, which you should know...
You're loving this aren't you? - It sure beats detention.
I don't know guys maybe we should go back to the detention room.
Well guys I think we might be in detention for the rest of our lives.
Okay, let's go. I think we should go back to the detention room...
But we can't ever say detention is dull again.
...they wouldn't end up in detention now would they?
